body_html:
We never had this file in TensorFlow, only in skflow -- I don't think it's particularly valuable to repeat this information, it's contained in the git repo itself, and github does a fine job showing the list.

(in particular, it's another thing to maintain explicitly, and it's hard to maintain properly. Even the file in this commit seems wrong -- it has only 69 lines)

body:
We never had this file in TensorFlow, only in skflow -- I don't think it's particularly valuable to repeat this information, it's contained in the git repo itself, and github does a fine job showing the list.

(in particular, it's another thing to maintain explicitly, and it's hard to maintain properly. Even the file in this commit seems wrong -- it has only 69 lines)
